name: Sound Forge Pro Audio Proxy File
summary: Learn about .SFAP0 files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: MAGIX offers Sound Forge Pro, an audio waveform editor, and VEGAS Pro, a video editor. Each app allows you to choose the setting preferences for SFAP0 files.

For example, you can adjust how Sound Forge Pro handles SFAP0 files via the software's preference settings (Options â†’ Preferences). You can perform various functions in this window, including hiding new SFAP0 files by selecting the Hide new temporary files checkbox.
NOTE: Sonic Foundry initially developed Sound Forge Pro until Sony acquired it in 2003. Then, MAGIX acquired Sound Forge Pro in 2016.

instructions: You should not attempt to open SFAP0 files since MAGIX Sound Forge Pro or MAGIX VEGAS Pro automatically references the files and loads their data.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
